attempts.content:
Here is the Gantt chart in Mermaid syntax:

```mermaid
gantt
  title Phone Swap Request Feature
  dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD

  section UX Team (October 14, 2025 - October 17, 2025)
  Create wireframe of modal and form 2025-10-15T00:00:00    2025-10-17T23:59:59

  section Backend Team (October 14, 2025 - October 21, 2025)
  Develop new API endpoint and database schema 2025-10-14T00:00:00    2025-10-21T23:59:59

  section Frontend Team (October 14, 2025 - October 21, 2025)
  Build "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure 2025-10-17T00:00:00    2025-10-21T23:59:59
  Begin implementation once wireframes are approved

  section Product Manager (October 14, 2025 - October 21, 2025)
  Create formal Jira ticket with defined user story and acceptance criteria 2025-10-14T00:00:00    2025-10-21T23:59:59
```

Note:

* The Gantt chart is divided into sections representing the different teams involved in the project (UX, Backend, Frontend, Product Manager).
* Each task is represented as a rectangle with start and end dates. The rectangles are aligned to represent dependencies between tasks.
* The horizontal axis represents time, with October 14, 2025, at the left edge of the chart and October 21, 2025, at the right edge.
* The vertical axis represents the different teams involved in the project.

This Gantt chart illustrates the timeline for implementing the phone swap request feature, including the tasks assigned to each team and their dependencies.

gantt
    title Phone Swap Request Feature
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    section UX Team (October 14, 2025 - October 17, 2025)
    Create wireframe of modal and form 2025-10-15T00:00:00    2025-10-17T23:59:59
    section Backend Team (October 14, 2025 - October 21, 2025)
    Develop new API endpoint and database schema 2025-10-14T00:00:00    2025-10-21T23:59:59
    section Frontend Team (October 14, 2025 - October 21, 2025)
    Build "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure 2025-10-17T00:00:00    2025-10-21T23:59:59
    Begin implementation once wireframes are approved
    section Product Manager (October 14, 2025 - October 21, 2025)
    Create formal Jira ticket with defined user story and acceptance criteria 2025-10-14T00:00:00    2025-10-21T23:59:59

gantt
    title Phone Swap Request Feature Implementation Plan
    section Frontend (UI/UX)
    UX Team: Create wireframe of modal and form          : 2025-10-17, 1d
    Frontend Team: Build "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure      : 2025-10-21, 4d
    section Backend (Logic)
    Backend Team: Develop new API endpoint and database schema     : 2025-10-21, 2d
    Backend Team: Implement backend validation for user ownership of offered phone   : 2025-10-24, 3d
    section Product Management
    Product Manager: Create formal Jira ticket with defined user story and acceptance criteria      : 2025-10-17, 1d
    dependencies:
    UX Team depends on Backend Team for wireframe approval
    Frontend Team depends on UX Team for wireframe approval
    Backend Team depends on Product Manager for formal Jira ticket creation
